Unseen Threat.name: Unseen Threat
Unseen Threat.blurb: When Kha'Zix is not visible to the enemy team, he gains Unseen Threat, causing his next basic attack against an enemy Champion to deal bonus magic damage and slow.
Unseen Threat.description: Innate - Isolation: Kha'Zix marks all enemy units who do not have any of their allies nearby as Isolated.  Taste Their Fear and  Void Spike have special interactions against Isolated targets.
Unseen Threat.description2: Innate: Kha'Zix gains Unseen Threat while out of enemy  sight, causing his next basic attack against an enemy champion to deal 14 − 150 (based on level) (+ 40% bonus AD)  bonus magic damage and  slow them by 25% for 2 seconds.
Unseen Threat.notes:
* All enemy units (including  monsters) are considered for the targeting of Isolated.
 Unseen Threat's damage will cause  Muramana's Shock damage to trigger twice with a single basic attack.
 The enhanced attack can apply  on-hit effects and  critically strike (magic damage is not modified).

Taste Their Fear.name: Taste Their Fear
Taste Their Fear.blurb: Deals physical damage to the target. Damage increased on Isolated targets. If he chooses to Evolve Reaper Claws, this refunds a percent of it's cooldown against Isolated targets. Kha'Zix also gains increased range on his basic attacks and Taste Their Fear.
Taste Their Fear.description: Active: Kha'Zix slashes the target enemy, dealing  physical damage, increased by 100% against Isolated targets.

Evolved Reaper Claws.name: Evolved Reaper Claws
Evolved Reaper Claws.description: Passive - Evolved Reaper Claws: Kha'Zix gains  50 bonus range on his basic attacks and Taste Their Fear.
Evolved Reaper Claws.description2: If the target is Isolated,  45% of the cooldown is refunded.

Void Spike.name: Void Spike
Void Spike.blurb: Kha'Zix fires exploding spikes that deal physical damage to enemies hit. Kha'Zix is healed if he is also within the explosion radius. If he chooses to Evolve Spike Racks, Void Spike now fires three spikes in a cone, slow enemies hit, and reveals enemy champions hit for 2 seconds. Isolated targets are slowed for extra.
Void Spike.description: Active: Kha'Zix fires a cluster of spikes in a line that detonates upon hitting an enemy dealing them physical damage.
Void Spike.description2: Kha'Zix  heals himself if he is within detonation radius.
Void Spike.notes: * Void Spike is actually composed of two mini projectiles which proceed in the target direction in a helical pattern, meaning it's collision radius is somewhat random.

Evolved Spike Racks.name: Evolved Spike Racks
Evolved Spike Racks.description: Passive - Evolved Spike Racks: Void Spike fires three clusters in a cone,  slows by 60% and grants  sight of enemy champions hit for 2 seconds. Multiple explosions do not deal extra damage to the same target or provide Kha'Zix with additional healing.
Evolved Spike Racks.description2: Isolated targets hit by Evolved Void Spike are  slowed by 90% instead.

Leap.name: Leap
Leap.blurb: Kha'Zix leaps to an area, dealing physical damage upon landing. If he chooses to Evolve Wings, Leap's range increases by 200 and the cooldown resets on champion kill or assist.
Leap.description: Active: Kha'Zix  leaps to the target location, dealing physical damage to nearby enemies upon landing.
Leap.notes:
* Kha'Zix can cast  Taste Their Fear on a target during the jump.
 He can also use summoner spells and active items.
  Flash will  cancel the leap as it is considered a movement spell.

Evolved Wings.name: Evolved Wings
Evolved Wings.description: Passive - Evolved Wings: Leap gains increased range and its  cooldown is reset on enemy champion  takedowns.
Evolved Wings.notes: * Decoys count as champions for the takedown effect.

Void Assault.name: Void Assault
Void Assault.blurb: Each rank allows Kha'Zix to evolve one of his abilities, giving it a unique additional effect. When activated, Kha'Zix becomes Invisible, triggering Unseen Threat and increasing Movement Speed. If he chooses to Evolve Adaptive Cloaking, while out of combat Kha'Zix also passively gains Void Assault upon entering a new brush.
Void Assault.description: Passive: Each rank in Void Assault allows Kha'Zix to evolve one of his abilities, granting it additional effects.
Void Assault.description2: Active: Kha'Zix enters  invisibility for 1.25 seconds, gaining  40% bonus movement speed, and  ghosting while stealthed.
Void Assault.description3: After 2 seconds of leaving  stealth, and for the next 10 seconds, Void Assault can be cast a second time at no additional cost.
Void Assault.notes:
* Void Assault has no cast time and does not interrupt Kha'Zix's previous orders.
 Every time Void Assault is ranked a secondary menu will pop up for Kha'Zix to choose which ability to evolve (can only be done once for each).
 Selecting one will cause Kha'Zix to begin channeling, receiving the evolution when it ends (disabling or killing Kha'Zix while transforming will not stop him from gaining the evolution).
 The only way for Kha'Zix to evolve all of his abilities is to gain the fourth evolution point by being victorious in The Hunt is On! (by scoring a kill/assist on  Rengar).

Evolved Adaptive Cloaking.name: Evolved Adaptive Cloaking
Evolved Adaptive Cloaking.description: Passive - Evolved Adaptive Cloaking: Increases the  invisibility duration to 2 seconds, and can be cast up to 3 times.

Void Assault 2.name: Void Assault
Void Assault 2.blurb: Each rank allows Kha'Zix to evolve one of his abilities, giving it a unique additional effect. When activated, Kha'Zix becomes Invisible, triggering Unseen Threat and increasing Movement Speed. If he chooses to Evolve Adaptive Cloaking, while out of combat Kha'Zix also passively gains Void Assault upon entering a new brush.
Void Assault 2.description: Passive: Each rank in Void Assault allows Kha'Zix to evolve one of his abilities, granting it additional effects.
Void Assault 2.description2: Active: Kha'Zix enters  invisibility for 1.25 seconds, gaining  40% bonus movement speed, and  ghosting while stealthed.
Void Assault 2.description3: After 2 seconds of leaving  stealth, and for the next 10 seconds, Void Assault can be cast a second time at no additional cost.
Void Assault 2.notes:
* Void Assault has no  cast time and does not interrupt Kha'Zix's previous orders.
 Every time Void Assault is ranked, a secondary menu will pop up for Kha'Zix to select an ability to evolve, this can only be done once per ability.
 Selecting one will cause Kha'Zix to begin channeling, receiving the evolution when it ends (disabling or killing Kha'Zix while transforming will not stop him from gaining the evolution).
 The only way for Kha'Zix to evolve all of his abilities is to gain the fourth evolution point by being victorious in The Hunt is On! (by scoring a kill/assist on  Rengar).
